AI Description: gfatools is a suite of tools for working with genomic sequence graphs and genome variation graphs. It provides functionalities for manipulating genomic graphs, performing sequence alignment on graphs, and analyzing variations within graphs.
Core Features:
1. Manipulation of genomic sequence graphs
2. Sequence alignment on graphs
3. Analysis of genome variations within graphs
General Tags: Genomics, Genome Variation Graphs, Sequence Alignment, Variation Analysis
